alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80; Western Uinta Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 02 at 11:08AM MST until December 02 at 3:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Widespread total snow accumulations of 12 to 18 inches. * WHERE...Wasatch Mountains I-80 North, Wasatch Mountains South of I- 80 and Western Uinta Mountains. * WHEN...Through 3 PM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Periods of winter driving conditions will continue through the early afternoon.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Prepare for possible power outages. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.

area.areaDesc: Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80; Western Uinta Mountains
